generated_body: If you click on the article titled "85 Thanksgiving Recipes You Can Make Ahead," you may expect to find a comprehensive collection of recipes that can be prepared in advance of the holiday. This could include a variety of dishes such as appetizers, side dishes, and desserts, all designed to save time and reduce stress on Thanksgiving Day. The article is likely to provide detailed instructions, along with tips for storing and reheating the dishes, making it easier for readers to plan their holiday meals effectively.
